ygData.subject: RE: Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: Killing undead anywhere will not get you banished from the guild. I am also a Dark Elf Necromancer and believe me you won t get in trouble with your Guild.
ygData.messageBody:
Killing undead anywhere will not get you banished from the guild. I am also a Dark Elf Necromancer and believe me you won't get in trouble with your Guild.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 33rd Circle (almost 34 :) new spells!! )



Message: 8
Date: Fri, 16 Jul 1999 13:09:10 -0400
From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
Subject: Re: Re: 16th Pet and 20pet

>The level 16th pet and 20pet are found in the Grobb Shadow Knight guild. As
>for hunting grounds I would suggest sticking to Oasis until 20 or at 18 or so
>you could move to Lake Rathe and hunt the undead at night and gnolls in the
>day.

I thought killing the undead at Lake Rathe would cause some horrible faction
change and get you banished from the guild or something? I'm a Dark Elf, maybe
it only applies to DE's? Can someone confirm or debunk this? Thanks.

jspectre @ innoruuk
